name: Math Circle classes at SF State
description: SF Math Circle offers weekly math enrichment classes for 2nd-6th graders at San Francisco State University. In these classes, students explore engaging, hands-on puzzles and games that help develop both creativity and critical thinking. Students explore these puzzles and games in small groups where they have the opportunity to collaborate with their peers and to receive personalized attention and support from SF Math Circle facilitators. We offer classes on Monday afternoons, Wednesday afternoon

howToGetIt: For more information and to register, please visit https://sfmathcircle.org/sf-state
